name: Blacksmith

aspects.high_concept: Master Craftsman of Steel and Fire
aspects.trouble: Pride in Work Can Cloud Judgment

stunts: Master Smith: +2 to Crafts when forging, repairing, or improving weapons and armor
Appraise Metalwork: +2 to Notice when evaluating quality, origin, or enchantments on metal items
Access to Materials: Can source rare metals and materials through contacts (once per session, locate specific material)

trust_clock.description: Trust level - affects quality of work, prices, and willingness to take special requests

notes: Blacksmiths are crucial for maintaining equipment and creating custom gear. They can repair damaged items, improve existing equipment, and craft new weapons and armor. Earning a blacksmith's trust can lead to access to special materials, better prices, and masterwork creations. Many blacksmiths have knowledge of ancient Nord smithing techniques.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Direct, practical, uses smithing metaphors, proud of craft
quirks: Tells stories through items they've made
Bears burn scars from forge work
